game.title: Quasiphies
game.description: Quasiphies is a French video-game studio/artistic collective (which has yet to be founded!). It is shaped around Lenophie's games and ideas, it gathers young talents from engineering and videogame/interactive media schools. They seek to make games that tell stories through game mechanics, games that make the players question their well-informed actions and beliefs. Quasiphies preaches love, inclusivity and tolerance. As such, many of its creations are designed to be cute yet weird.

history.text: Years before Horribunnies, Lenophie met Valentin, they both delved into game-making as a hobby, the former as a gamedev and the latter as a musician. While Lenophie got into programming, various mini-games were made by the duo. The end of their studies approaching, they started working by the end of 2018 on their first videogame aimed at commercial release. The project was paused because of how large its scope was and how motivation quickly shifted to Horribunnies. That other project ? It certainly won't gather dust for long!

Lenophie participated in a game-jam organized by Abiding Bridge mid-2019. There, they met Pakrett, a graphic designer, the kind of talent Lenophie had been looking for to bring their vision to life ! Bunny enthusiasts as they are, they both settled for developing a bunny-related game in a minimal amount of time, so they could tell if they liked working together. The scope of the game grew and... voilà, the team was expanded with the arrival of a musician, a narrative designer and another graphic designer !

It is currently (Dec 2019) planned that Horribunnies will be released through Abiding Bridge, a publisher which doesn't require us to found a studio in order to work with us. Quasiphies remains, for now, a rallying word for the current team, a rallying word that may or may not grow into a fully-fledged artistic collective or games studio.

additional.title: Abiding Bridge
additional.description: Abiding Bridge is our publisher. This publisher enables french developers to publish games without creating a company. It's neat and we love them.

additional.title: Mahoumu
additional.description: Mahoumu is an endless-runner game with magical girl aesthetics. We made it as part of another 3-days Abiding Bridge gamejam by late 2019 !

credit.person: The other nice people from Horribunnies'/Mahoumu's team
